casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Kevin JACKSON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 21, 2018

Peter G. Billings, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Elizabeth S. Tanaka, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

*1042The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 40, 177 A.3d 1190 (2017), is denied.
